main event: On January 17, 1969, a civilian witness reported observing an unusual flying object in the sky near Crittenden, Virginia.
interesting points: The object produced a sound similar to an electric motor that woke the observer from sleep., The object was observed moving in an elliptical fashion before it hovered and made a left banking turn., The witness described the object as bright and round with glowing lights around its perimeter., The object was visible for about 90 to 120 seconds before disappearing from view., There were no other reports of helicopter activity in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a round object with glowing lights
witness description: L.B.A., a 50-year-old female Test Facility Mechanic at NASA
